brief_title: Impact of Non-Commercialism Policy in Seattle Schools
brief_summary: This is a 3-year pilot study funded by National Institute of Health will assess and evaluate obesity-related health outcomes of a real-life policy decision, recently voted on and adopted by the Seattle School Board.
intervention_name: Water, Cafeteria and Staff Health Promotion
criteria: Inclusion: All students who attend Cleveland and Rainier Beach high schools are eligible. Exclusion: Those who are no longer attending those schools.
